name: Replicat-One by Virtuals
description: Replicats is an AI-driven platform for autonomous crypto trading agents. We believe that the current landscape of crypto analytics is still dominated by superficial approachesâ€”too many solutions rely on pure Large Language Models (LLMs) that cannot capture the intricate nuances of market data. At Replicats, we are convinced that a truly holistic view of crypto assets demands a multi-modal approach, incorporating price time series, on-chain interactions, social sentiment, and more.
